name: National Deaf Services Line
objective: To provide remote services to Deaf victims of domestic violence, dating violence, sexual assault, and stalking.
categories: Law, Justice, and Legal Services - Law Enforcement Support
rules_regulations:
Program notices of funding opportunity (NOFO) can be found at https://www.justice.gov/ovw/open-notices-of-funding-opportunities. 

Recipients must comply with the current version of the DOJ Financial Grants Management Guide found at https://www.justice.gov/ovw/grant-management.

pons.pon: Increase Support Services for Individuals with Disabilities
